keepConnect.name: Hlala uxhumekile
keepConnect.helperText: Uma uchofoza kusixhumanisi sokuqala, bese ugcine isixhumanisi. Lokhu kudinga ukunakwa ukuthi isixhumanisi sizoxhunyaniswa ngokuqhubekayo ngemuva kokuthi inqanyuliwe.

url.name: Ujulu
url.helperText: Xhumanisa i-URL, isibonelo i-WS: //192.168.0.2: 7001, noma i-WWS: //Exple.com/path
url.error: I-URL efanele iyi-URL eqala nge-WS: // noma i-WWS: //
